name: Dress To Impress
description:
The cutest avatar-making app now available on iOS!

Channel your inner fashion guru with Dress to Impress! Express your individuality through mixing and matching chic and posh clothing. Recreate yourself and your friends as adorable avatars!

Go on daily fashion trips—walk down the glamorous runways in Paris and Madrid using the ""Impress"" feature to earn Fashion Points. Use these points to purchase more items for your avatar, such as skins, eyes, clothes, etc. Spread the glamour! Express your style! Dress to impress!
